Articles.Content:
Hi. I\'m a fairly new kerbalnaught, got started watching a series on youtube and now I\'m doing my own letsplay of it and playing it all the time off-screen. I still haven\'t gone to sleep.

I also have a question, is their anyway to remove the tower from the launch pad? It\'s messing with some of my bigger designs, and I haven\'t been able to find a map mod or anything of the sort.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

You can\'t move the launchpad tower but you can shift your rocket in the VAB from the center to the edge a little. This may not help much if it moves the rocket off the side and make it fall over. There are plans for other launchpads and I would think one will be designed for mega-ships.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

I\'ve nrever felt the need to move the tower, since any of my ships wide enough to do that explode violently.

Its a touch game, but half the fun is learning how to stop your ropckets exploding. The other half is watching them explode.
